choose.when: where writer in (select id from users where name like '%'|| #{keyword} || '%')
where title like '%'|| #{keyword} || '%' or content like '%'|| #{keyword} || '%' or writer in (select id from users where name like '%'|| #{keyword} || '%')

mapper.select: SELECT q.*, (SELECT name FROM users u WHERE u.id=q.writer) name FROM (SELECT q.*, rownum r FROM (SELECT * FROM qna order by writedate desc) q ORDER BY r) q WHERE r BETWEEN ((${currentPage}-1)*10)+1 AND ${currentPage}*10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (id, writer, title, content) VALUES (qna_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content})
INSERT INTO qnaComments (id, qnaId, writer, content) VALUES (qna_comment_seq.nextval, #{qnaId}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, (SELECT name FROM users u WHERE u.id=writer) name FROM qnaComments c WHERE qnaId = #{qnaId} ORDER BY id desc
